headline: $1.5 Billion In One Day: Why Bitcoin And Ethereum ETFs Are Running Wild

headline: Talen Stock Soars on Plant Purchases. Why the Market Is Excited About the Nuclear Play’s Bet on Gas.
summary: Talen Energy  stock was soaring early Friday after it expanded its power plant portfolio.  The independent power producer said late Thursday it would acquire two combined-cycle gas-fired plants for $3.5 billion.  The acquired plants are Caithness Energy’s Moxie Freedom Energy Center in Pennsylvania and Caithness Energy and  BlackRock’  s Guernsey Power Station in Ohio.
